loginPage.title: How do you want to log in?

spidSelect.title: Select your SPID
spidSelect.hintText: Do you not have a SPID?<0> Discover more</0>

loginError.title: Due to a system error, the procedure cannot be completed.
loginError.message: Due to a system error, the procedure cannot be completed. Please try again later.

code.error_19: You have entered an incorrect username or password too many times; try again in a few minutes or contact your SPID identity provider to change your credentials.
code.error_20: For security reasons, a login with a second authentication factor is required: contact your SPID identity provider to find out how to use it.
code.error_21: It's been too long since you started the process of logging in: start from the beginning.
code.error_22: To use the platform, you must consent to the transmission of certain data. Renter the data and give your consent.
code.error_23: Your SPID identity has been suspended or revoked. To reactivate your account, contact your SPID identity provider.
code.error_25: You have canceled the login operation: you can try again whenever you want.
code.error_30: The type of SPID identity you used is different from the one requested by the Service Provider. Re-enter the information using the correct identity.
code.error_1001: Access denied: You are not of the minimum age required to use the platform.

disambiguationPage.title: Which profile do you want to log in with?
disambiguationPage.subTitle: We will redirect you based on your selection.
